name: Ultimate Game Room
description:
How will you fare in the ultimate compilation of game room activities for the Nintendo DS? Master Pool, Darts and Bowling on the go alone or with a friend in this addicting recreational sports title at a great value. Compete in Tournaments against some of the best game room champs or challenge a friend to head to head competition.

  • Play 3 classic game room games including Bowling, Pool, and Darts, all with different modes of play including 8-Ball, 9-Ball, 501, Around the Clock, and more!
  • Choose from Tournament mode and Quickplay mode
  • 8 zany characters to choose from, each with his/her own unique attributes and attitudes
  • Play with a friend in a local 2 player pool or darts and up to 4 players in bowling!
